description.en: A package containing 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal and a Kitty or Doggy (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal and a Kitty or Doggy (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.br: Um pacote contendo Pedra Mágica (x10), Revigorante X (x5) ou Poção Suprema (x5), Pergaminho de Amplificação ES (x3), Teleporte de Madrigal (x10) e um Gatinho ou Cachorrinho de 7 dias. Todos os itens são ligados à alma.
description.cns: 一个包含10个力量之石、5个无敌活力多或者无敌魔力多、3个ES经验加成卷轴、10个万能翅膀和淘气的凯蒂或者聪明的多吉 (7 天)的礼包。所有物品都是角色绑定的。
description.de: Ein Paket mit 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vitaldrink X oder Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Experience ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal und ein Kitty oder Doggy (7 Tage). Alle Items sind auch gebunden.
description.fi: A package containing 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal and a Kitty or Doggy (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.fil: A package containing 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal and a Kitty or Doggy (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.fr: Paquet qui contient 10 Pierres de Mars, 5 Boissons Énergétique X ou Fioles de Mana X, 3 Parchemins de Maîtrise ES, 10 Élytres de Madrigal et un Bébé Chat ou un Bébé Chien (7 Jours). Tous les objets seront liés à votre personnage.
description.id: Paket ini berisi 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X atau Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal dan Kitty atau Doggy (7 Days). Semua item saling berhubungan.
description.it: A package containing 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal and a Kitty or Doggy (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.jp: パワーストーンx10、バイタルドリンクXまたは魔力ドリングゴールド、戦神の巻物ESx3、ブリンクウィング（マドリガル）とキティまたはドギー（7日）が含まれたパッケージ。アイテムは全て帰属です。

description.sp: Un Paquete con 10 Piedra Recortadora, 5 Bebida Vital X o Retendor de actualización, 3 Pergamino de Amplificación ES, 10 Ala Parpadeante de Madrigal y Gatito o Perrito (7 Days). Todos los artículos son Vinculados.

description.th: แพ็คเกจที่ประกอบด้วย Upcut Stone 10 ชิ้น, Vital Drink X 5 ชิ้น หรือ Refresher Hold และ Scroll of Amplification ES 3 ชิ้น ,Blinkwing of Madrigal 10 ชิ้น และ Kitty or Doggy (7 วัน) ไอเทมทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 一個包含 10 力量之石、5 活力多X或無限技能飲、3經驗加成卷軸、10瑪德利賈回卷和一隻小貓或小狗（7天）的禮盒。所有物品都是歸屬的。
description.vi: Một gói hàng chứa 10 Upcut Stone, 5 Vital Drink X hoặc Refresher Hold, 3 Scroll of Amplification ES, 10 Blinkwing of Madrigal và Kitty hoặc Doggy (7 ngày). Tất cả các vật phẩm trên đều là Soul-Linked.
